summary:
Pilot: Stark Private Airlines welcomes you, and reminds you that we are about to reach our cruising altitude.
Peter: Yeah! I'm...
body:
Pilot: Stark Private Airlines welcomes you, and reminds you that we are about to reach our cruising altitude.

Peter: Yeah! I’m about to join the Mile High Club!

Tony: What?!

Peter: *checks altimeter*

Peter: ONE MILE HIGH, BABY! YEAH!

Tony: Peter. Oh my God. That’s not-

summary: the fact that peter parker’s middle name is benjamin makes me??????? so angry????????????? always has???????????? it was almost...
body: the fact that peter parker’s middle name is benjamin makes me??????? so angry????????????? always has???????????? it was almost so perfect, ya got mr wade winston wilson over there, and mr matthew michael murdock, but nooooo mr peter parker couldn’t finish off team red with a nice lil penjamin, he had to go be peter Benjamin parker

summary: Y’all ever think about how even tho most of the characters who disintegrated in Infinity War pretty much didn’t see it coming,...
body: Y’all ever think about how even tho most of the characters who disintegrated in Infinity War pretty much didn’t see it coming, and just dissolved in the middle of doing shit, but Peter Parker looks down at his arm and immediately starts panicking for like 15 seconds bc his spidey sense tells him what’s coming? And that’s why he’s so scared, why his process is so much longer than the others, and why he seems like to be in much more pain than all the others who died in the snap? Bc I do

reblog.comment: Y’all ever think about how even tho most of the characters who disintegrated in Infinity War pretty much didn’t see it coming, and just dissolved in the middle of doing shit, but Peter Parker looks down at his arm and immediately starts panicking for like 15 seconds bc his spidey sense tells him what’s coming? And that’s why he’s so scared, why his process is so much longer than the others, and why he seems like to be in much more pain than all the others who died in the snap? Bc I do

trail.content_raw: Y’all ever think about how even tho most of the characters who disintegrated in Infinity War pretty much didn’t see it coming, and just dissolved in the middle of doing shit, but Peter Parker looks down at his arm and immediately starts panicking for like 15 seconds bc his spidey sense tells him what’s coming? And that’s why he’s so scared, why his process is so much longer than the others, and why he seems like to be in much more pain than all the others who died in the snap? Bc I do
trail.content: Y’all ever think about how even tho most of the characters who disintegrated in Infinity War pretty much didn’t see it coming, and just dissolved in the middle of doing shit, but Peter Parker looks down at his arm and immediately starts panicking for like 15 seconds bc his spidey sense tells him what’s coming? And that’s why he’s so scared, why his process is so much longer than the others, and why he seems like to be in much more pain than all the others who died in the snap? Bc I do

Hey, how's going? This is my back up blog in case my side-blog

MaxMarvel123

get deactivated. My fave staff are comic books, TV series, video games, etc. I 'm an art collector (well...kind of) who like collecting artwork fan-art, design, redesign, sketchbook, illustration and every galleries, i'm posting comic panels and pages. I'm a Marvel fan (NOT MCU GARBAGE, Marvel Comics fan), there's lot of comic publishers i like are DC Comics, Dark Horse Comics, Valiant Comics, Image Comics, etc etc etc!

summary: Marvel Knights: Spider-Man Vol. 1 #6 - Venomous, Part Two (2004) Writer by: Mark Millar Penciller by: Terry Dodson Inker by:...

Writer by: Mark Millar
Penciller by: Terry Dodson
Inker by: Rachel Dodson
